item.title: Portal 2 announced
item.dc:creator: busterofwar
item.description:
Sigh…
It feels strange to have to complain about a sequel to one of my favourite games, especially when it could actually be very good. Valve could have done so much more with this.
Half life 2: Episode 3 is long overdue!

Episode 1 - June 1, 2006
Episode 2 - October 10, 2007
Episode 3 - 2011, 2012, 2013, 2014?

Valve really need to get a move on. This should have been out in 2008, now I really expect it to be at least the size of Half-Life 2.
I have a lot of respect for Valve and their work, however it has been 3 years since episode 2 and people are getting tired of waiting.
They should have just made Half-Life 3 and had six years of development time like they did between HL and HL2. (Meaning that Half Life 3 would be releasing around now.)
I could rant all day about this however it would get boring…

Read full topic
